entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending overnight then clearing. Risk of thunderstorms early this evening. Amount 2 cm except 4 cm near Fernie. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 7:05 PM MDT Monday 27 March 2023
